overview: A lazy , bibulous tramp is admitted to the hospital by mistake. Even though he is forced to obey new rules like showering and drinking milk instead of alcohol, life in the hospital is like a dream. He is fed every day and cared for by beautiful nurses. The only problem: He isn't really ill. When he is finally dicharged, his only goal is to get back into the white paradise. (stumfilm.dk)
title: Paradise for the Lazy
